## Technical Details/Implementation

### Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r}
# Load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)

# Load the dataset
data <- read.csv("DS6040F24_finaldat.csv")

# Summary statistics
summary(data)

# Convert all required columns to a consistent type (character for categorical variables, numeric for continuous)
data <- data %>%
  mutate(
    gender = as.character(gender),
    day_of_week = as.character(day_of_week),
    time_of_day = as.character(time_of_day),
    nationality = as.character(nationality)
  )

# Pivot the data
eda_plot <- data %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(age, gender, nationality, day_of_week, time_of_day),
    names_to = "Variable",
    values_to = "Value"
  ) %>%
  mutate(Value = as.character(Value))  # Ensure `Value` is consistently a character

# Plot the data
eda_plot_graph <- ggplot(eda_plot, aes(x = Value, y = MinPerBlock)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(fill = Variable), alpha = 0.7, outlier.shape = NA) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.2, alpha = 0.3) +
  facet_wrap(~ Variable, scales = "free", ncol = 2) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Exploratory Data Analysis: User Engagement",
    x = "Variable Categories",
    y = "Minutes Per Block"
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    strip.text = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold")
  )

# Print the plot
print(eda_plot_graph)
```
